entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young boy who survived a curse from Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: A dark sorcerer who cast a curse on Harry and killed his parents.

entities.name: harry's mother
entities.description: Harry's mother who died in Voldemort's attack.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The family that took care of Harry after his parents' death.

relationships.description: Harry was the target of Lord Voldemort's curse.
Voldemort failed to kill Harry, and his powers were destroyed in the process.
The Dursleys took care of Harry after his parents' death.
